backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and customer inquiries with access control and admin‑only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens for the site.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all site sections with navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the Vaishnavi brand image in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying business info, disclaimer, copyright, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Validated inquiry form allowing contact or service requests and submitting them via backend API.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Sticky navigation bar with scroll‑to‑section links, mobile menu, and logo.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact details, operator info, and phone/WhatsApp action buttons using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Renders an inquiry form wrapped in a styled card with title and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with business name, tagline, greeting text, and call/WhatsApp buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service categories and items from siteContent in responsive cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays reasons to choose the business using icon cards sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Contains static business info, hero text, service definitions, and why-choose-us content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation hook to submit inquiries through the backend actor and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with saffron/green accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, notes, and image needs for the Vaishnavi E‑Mitra & CSC website.
